name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1. Introduction, modeling, and computational complexity
2. Linear programming
3. Integer programming
4. Evolutionary computation
5. Design and analysis of experiments
schedule:
第一週　　Course overview
第二週　　Terminology and model building 
第三週　　Model building 
第四週　　Linear programming
第五週　　Integer programming
第六週　　Computational complexity
第七週　　Simple genetic algorithms
第八週　　Simple genetic algorithms
第九週　　Midterm
第十週　　Theories behind genetic algorithms
第十一週　Modern evolutionary computation: PSO, cGA, multi-objective GA, etc.
第十二週　Statistical optimization: Robust design
第十三週　Statistical optimization: Two-level factorial design of experiments
第十四週　Statistical optimization: How to design better experimental setup?
第十五週　Statistical optimization: Applications
第十六週　Presentation
第十七週　Presentation
第十八週　Final
scorePolicy:
考試　50%
簡報　20%
書面報告　30%
materials:
參考書目:
1. F. S. Hillier and G. J. Lieberman, Introduction to Operations Research, 9th edition, McGraw-Hill (2010).
2. D. E. Goldberg, The Design of Innovation: Lessons from and for Competent Genetic Algorithms. New York: Springer (2002).
3. D. C. Montgomery, Design and Analysis of Experiments. New York: Wiley (2005).
4. S. C. Albright, C. J. Zappe, and W. L. Winston, Data Analysis, Optimization, and Simulation Modeling, 4th edition, South-Western (2011).（東華書局代理）
5. 林聖泉，工程分析與最佳化設計，東華書局 (2011)。
